title: Was Joe Biden really using a wire during the first presidential debate in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Let me start be prefacing that I am *not* a Republican, let alone a fan of Donald Trump. I consider myself an ex-Democrat. I answer this coming from an Independent’s perspective. Simply put, it would seem that a video clip has been identified and shared of a wire- or at least, something thus resembling- poking out from within Biden’s jacket, to which he seems to lower his head now and again.  I’ll spare you my heartfelt lament on how it made me feel to see this. If anyone would like to explain to me whether this is indeed what it seems to be, and why or why not, you’d have my gratitude. Otherwise I have little choice but to believe what I see. Goodness knows four years of 45 spewing folly and division on camera has made that clear. In my opinion this leaves the question open of just how well Biden would debate impromptu, without preparation time. Unlike a lot of folks, I won’t go so far as to say that I think that this necessarily disproves Biden could hold his own in a debate - however, I do think now the onus is on him to prove that he can, of which I’m eager to see. 10/1/2020 Update: A couple of things. First: I am very grateful to the responses to this concern of mine, demonstrating as well as explaining: The “wire” does, in fact, seem to be a shirt crease. To each person who shared this, thank you; Secondly; At least one person has suggested I wrote this with the intention of detracting from Biden’s legitimacy. Others may suggest the same. I want to dispel this. I don’t particularly like Biden, but I have no intention of trying… what was suggested. I’ve been coming to terms with voting for him to oust Trump, in fact; Wire or none, gaffs and all, Biden’s a more dignified man and less incompetent at least than our current “president”. I wrote my answer because I genuinely had limited understanding of the situation, and I needed to answers. Fairness and a willingness to question our own matters in addressing concerns about our candidates; I’ve spent about three years watching a man get away with his fanbase never bothering to question him, and this above all else I vow not to be.

Some people are so dumb or so unbelievably biased that they will believe ANYTHING which contributes to their cognitive dissonance.Of course Joe Biden was not wearing a wire - the massive trolling campaign from the cultists proves that more conclusively than anything else.
